00027 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 bool Agent::handleMessage(const Message& _message)
00029 {
00030   switch(_message.m_message)
00031   {
00032     case msgAttack:
00033     {
00034       m_health -= (_message.m_extraInfo * m_timeElapsed);
00035       return true;
00036     }
00037     default:
00038     {
00039       std::cout<<"Agent: Message type not defined"<<std::endl;
00040       return false;
00041     }
00042   }
00043 }

00045 void Agent::registerLua(lua_State* _L)
00046 {
00047   luabridge::getGlobalNamespace(_L)
00048     .beginClass<Agent>("Agent")
00049       .addFunction("getID", &Agent::getID)
00050       .addProperty("m_morale", &Agent::getMorale, &Agent::setMorale)
00051       .addProperty("m_health", &Agent::getHealth, &Agent::setHealth)
00052       .addProperty("m_rage", &Agent::getRage, &Agent::setRage)
00053       .addProperty("m_damage", &Agent::getDamage, &Agent::setDamage)
00054       .addFunction("getTargetID", &Agent::getTargetID)
00055       .addFunction("wander", &Agent::wander)
00056       .addFunction("pursuit", &Agent::pursuit)
00057       .addFunction("evade", &Agent::evade)
00058       .addFunction("arrive", &Agent::arrive)
00059       .addFunction("seek", &Agent::seek)
00060       .addFunction("cohesion", &Agent::cohesion)
00061       .addFunction("separation", &Agent::separation)
00062       .addFunction("alignment", &Agent::alignment)
00063       .addFunction("checkValidTarget", &Agent::checkValidTarget)
00064       .addFunction("targetWithinReach", &Agent::targetWithinReach)
00065       .addProperty("m_maxSpeed", &Agent::getMaxSpeed, &Agent::setMaxSpeed)
00066     .endClass();
00067 }

00069 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 void Agent::wander(double _weight)
00071 {
00072   if(_weight <= 0.0)
00073   {
00074     Vehicle::Steering()->WanderOff();
00075   }
00076   else
00077   {
00078     Vehicle::Steering()->WanderOn();
00079     Vehicle::Steering()->setWanderWeight(_weight);
00080   }
00081 }

00181 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 void Agent::setTargetID(int _val)
00183 {
00184   m_targetID = _val;
00185   if (_val < 0)
00186   {
00187       Vehicle::Steering()->setTargetAgent(NULL);
00188   }
00189   else
00190   {
00191     Vehicle::Steering()->setTargetAgent((Vehicle*)m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_targetID));
00192   }
00193 }

00195 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 void Agent::checkValidTarget(float _dist, float _health)
00197 {
00198   if(m_targetID >= 0)
00199   {
00200     std::map<int, BaseGameEntity*>::const_iterator entity = m_entityMgr->getEntityMap().find(m_targetID);
00201     if(entity->first !=  m_entityMgr->getEntityMap().end()->first)
00202     {
00203       Agent* target = dynamic_cast<Agent*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_targetID));
00204 
00205       ngl::Vec3 toEntity = m_pos - target->getPos();
00206       double distSqFromEachOther = toEntity.lengthSquared();
00207       // change target
00208       if(distSqFromEachOther > ((m_boundingRadius * _dist) * (m_boundingRadius * _dist)) || target->getHealth() < _health)
00209       {
00210         findTargetID(_health);
00211       }
00212     }
00213     else
00214     {
00215       findTargetID(_health);
00216     }
00217   }
00218   else
00219   {
00220     // target is not set
00221     findTargetID(_health);
00222   }
00223 }
00224 
00225 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00226 bool Agent::targetWithinReach(float _reach)
00227 {
00228   Agent* target = dynamic_cast<Agent*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_targetID));
00229   if((m_pos - target->getPos()).lengthSquared() <= (_reach * _reach))
00230   {
00231     return true;
00232   }
00233   else
00234   {
00235     return false;
00236   }
00237 }
